title: Trippers
description: It was supposed to be the vacation of their thirteen teenagers, no chaperones, in a mansion up on a hill. But their weekend of fun and enjoyment turns to one of horror and despair when bizarre occurences plague them and the house takes on a malevolent life of its own. Soon the gang realizes that their hilltop stay is indeed the vacation of their lives, as they wind up fighting to survive
author: Nick Choo
